item.title: Do you really need that metadata column?
item.description: It is one of the tenets of Plone optimization that brain.getObject() should be avoided and instead new metadata columns should be defined, to pass have that information in the brain. In the interest of keeping the ZODB free of junk and avoid duplication of information, I argue that it is possible sometimes to avoid polluting the catalog and instead use the information stored in the index itself.  As an example: when exploring collective.
